knimeNode.name: IDF
knimeNode.shortDescription: Computes the inverse document frequency (idf) of each term according to the given set of documents and adds a column containing the idf value.

fullDescription.intro:
Computes the inverse document frequency (idf) of each term according to the given set of documents and adds a column containing the idf value. The value for term t is computed as follows: idf(t) = log(1 + (f(D) / f(d, t)),
where f(D) is the number of all documents and f(d, t) is the number of documents containing term t.
fullDescription.option: Specifies the document column to use for frequency counting.

inPort.name: Terms and related documents input table

ports.inPort: The input table which contains terms and documents.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains terms documents and a corresponding frequency value.
